comment: Feel cheated. Some of the worst whiskey I have tasted at the price point  Thin and hot. Lacks balance and complexity.
If it was priced at $20 it’d be a great whiskey but at $30 feels a bit watered down. I judged a book by its cover & missed.
Caramel and vanilla are there but it seems flat. From the scent to the taste. Surprised after what I paid for this. Decent but doesn't do enough to  buy more.
super smooth. caramel flavor, good taste
Flat. Not exciting. Wanting more from independent Texas whiskey
Terrible. Young, weak, tastes like straight up alcohol. No flavor.
I like the limestone filtered water.  Makes the whiskey different from others.  I like it for the price too!!
Better than balcones in terms of single malts from Texas, IMO
